chunk-f08fa90ed86e33cca2697ff366884585.description: CNN Network is part of the Title Encoder, used to learn contextual word representations by capturing local context information.

chunk-6ed1a98565ec22824cdc72d53742fe1a.description: LSTM is a sequence-based encoder used in the STUR model for learning short-term user representations and can replace GRU. It is associated with the development by Hochreiter and Schmidhuber.

chunk-278340890fd0f192f781f9e8a3aa3bbf.description: Microsoft News provided technical support, data, and personnel for the experiments in the paper. It is also the source of the real-world dataset used for experiments.
